title: Man ashiv le-Yahoweh, or, A serious enquiry for a suitable return for continued life, in and after a time of great mortality, by a wasting plague (anno 1665) answered in XIII directions / by Tho. Doolitel.
author: Doolittle, Thomas, 1632?-1707.
publisher: Printed by R.I. for J. Johnson, and are to be sold by A. Brewster ... and R. Boulter ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
